body_html: Has anyone looked at making tensorflow work with Kotlin? It seems a more natural fit and it's still 100% java at the end of the day. I find the Kotlin language to be a very nice middle ground between python and pure Java.
body_text: Has anyone looked at making tensorflow work with Kotlin?  It seems a more natural fit and it's still 100% java at the end of the day.  I find the Kotlin language to be a very nice middle ground between python and pure Java.
